operations.description: Create directory structure for research output

Create directory structure for progressive deployment research

operations.description: Create directory structure for research output

operations.command:
cd ~/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/research/ && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs: research progressive deployment ecosystem

Researched stack, features, architecture, and pitfalls for trading-focused
progressive deployment orchestration.

Key findings:
- Stack: Argo Rollouts 1.8.x + Argo CD 2.13.x + Prometheus (canonical)
- Architecture: CI/CD boundary separation (GitHub Actions → GitOps → Argo)
- Critical pitfall: Wrong metric selection (business metrics > infra)

Ready for roadmap creation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

cd ~/.claude/progressive-deploy && [ -f .planning/PROJECT.md ] && echo "PROJECT_EXISTS" || echo "NO_PROJECT"; [ -f .planning/research/FEATURES.md ] && echo "HAS_RESEARCH" || echo "NO_RESEARCH"; [ -f .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md ] && echo "REQUIREMENTS_EXISTS" || echo "NO_REQUIREMENTS"
operations.description: Validate project and check for research/requirements

operations.command:
cd ~/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs: define v1 requirements

30 requirements across 7 categories:
- Core Orchestration (6)
- Analysis & Metrics (5)
- Trading-Specific Metrics (4)
- Rollback & Recovery (4)
- Notifications & Integrations (4)
- Multi-Repo Support (4)
- Cloud Architecture (3)

9 requirements deferred to v2.
7 features explicitly out of scope.

Core value: Zero-friction, fail-safe deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

cd ~/.claude/progressive-deploy && [ -f .planning/PROJECT.md ] && echo "PROJECT_EXISTS" || echo "NO_PROJECT"; [ -f .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md ] && echo "REQUIREMENTS_EXISTS" || echo "NO_REQUIREMENTS"; [ -f .planning/ROADMAP.md ] && echo "ROADMAP_EXISTS" || echo "NO_ROADMAP"; [ -d .planning/research ] && echo "RESEARCH_EXISTS" || echo "NO_RESEARCH"

operations.old_string:
## Traceability

Which phases cover which requirements. Updated by create-roadmap.

| Requirement | ...

operations.command:
cd ~/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/ROADMAP.md .planning/STATE.md .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md .planning/phases/ && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs: create roadmap (7 phases, 30 requirements)

Progressive Deployment Orchestrator for trading systems with auto-rollback.

Phases:
1. Foundation: ORCH-01-06, ANLS-01
2. CI/CD Pipeline: REPO-01, REPO-04
3. Analysis Templates: ANLS-02-05
4. Trading Metrics: TRAD-01-04
5. Rollback & Notifications: ROLL-01-04, NOTF-01-04
6. Multi-Repo Templates: REPO-02-03
7. Multi-Env Promotion: CLUD-01-03

All v1 requirements mapped to phases.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
